pageContext.claim: “In the end -- in the end, Mexico is going to pay for the wall. I'm just telling you. ... They're going to pay for the wall and they're going to enjoy it. OK?”
pageContext.analysis: Trump alternates between saying Congress will approve funding for the wall and saying Mexico will pay for it. The sitting Mexican president and all the presidential candidates in 2018 have vowed Mexico will never pay for the wall.
